title: Mordekaiser Changes
body: Thank you, Riot. Thank you. THANK YOU. This is... ohmergerd. Just the dragon bit alone is amazing. Ima have to log onto the PBE soon to be able to sit there and have a gamergasm over this new Morde.

replies.body: Now i can finally delete LoL after they destroyed two of my favorite champions.

Do you realize that I am referring to the OP and agreeing with you?
I completely understand what you're saying. My question is, why is he not allowed to be hyped about this just because he doesn't play Mordekaiser?

> [{quoted}](name=Laraso,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TYLNufYK,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-04T21:50:02.563+0000)
>
> I completely understand what you're saying. My question is, why is he not allowed to be hyped about this just because he doesn't play Mordekaiser?

Because it is exactly what this is about. A bait for players who never played Morde. And a total kick in the balls for the people who play him. It is good to see things that lead players to try champions that they weren't attracted to before (I might buy Fiora now), but Riot should listen first to the people who have played and cared and experimented and known the Champion for years.

I've played him quite a bit, actually. I haven't used him lately, no. My last couple of games I've used him, but that was before I even saw anything. I have a build on Warframe using a Magister because I love Morde and one of the songs I've listened to repeatedly for the last couple years is 6v4 by AoD. lol. Just because I don't main him doesn't mean much. I don't main any one champion. I player everything.

So many simple minded people getting hyped up over the gimmicky as hell novelty of being able to control a dragon for 30 seconds.

Blind to the fact that every other part of Mordekaiser is getting gutted.
